I’m telling you to learn it yourself so that you know what you’re doing and you don’t get fucking errors you retarded prick.
[/quote]

Chill, no reason to flame.[/quote]
WEll cunt i dont spend all my fucking time making and coding servers like you I actually have a live so go fuck a goat you fucking jew.

item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Nevermind, just don’t tell me to fuck off when Im suggesting something to him.

And sic pure is right about the untradable int.

The format is:

public int untradable[] = {ITEMID,ITEMID,ITEMID,ITEMID,ITEMID,ITEMID,ITEMID,ITEMID,};

Wait, “Give me help or fuck off”?

We don’t have to help you, you inconsiderate retard.

item.title: How do i make skillcapes untradeable, sellable, stakeable, dropable?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

item.java

[code]FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File(
“data/stackable.dat”));
while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
if (c == 0)
itemStackable[counter] = false;
else
itemStackable[counter] = true;
counter++;
}

				itemStackable[10705] = true;
				itemStackable[10708] = true;
				itemStackable[10711] = true;
				itemStackable[10714] = true;
				itemStackable[10717] = true;
				itemStackable[10720] = true;
				itemStackable[10723] = true;
				itemStackable[10726] = true;
				itemStackable[10729] = true;
				itemStackable[10732] = true;
				itemStackable[10735] = true;
				itemStackable[10738] = true;
				itemStackable[10741] = true;
				itemStackable[10744] = true;
				itemStackable[10747] = true;
				itemStackable[10750] = true;
				itemStackable[10753] = true;
				itemStackable[10756] = true;
				itemStackable[10759] = true;
				itemStackable[10762] = true;
				itemStackable[10765] = true;
				itemStackable[10768] = true;
				//itemStackable[10866] = true; means stackable change to false for unstackable
		dataIn.close();
		int[] runeId = { 6430, 6432, 565, 6428, 6422, 566, 6434, 6424 };
		for (int i = 0; i < runeId.length; i++) {
			itemStackable[runeId[i]] = true;
		}
	} catch (IOException e) {
		System.out
				.println("Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace:");
		e.printStackTrace();
	}

	counter = 0;
	try {
		FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File(
				"data/notes.dat"));
		while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
			if (c == 0)
				itemIsNote[counter] = true;
			else
				itemIsNote[counter] = false;
			counter++;
		}
		dataIn.close();

//itemIsNote[counter] = false; means that the itwm isnt notable visa versa
} catch (IOException e) {
System.out.println(“Critical error while loading notedata! Trace:”);
e.printStackTrace();
}

	counter = 0;
	try {
		FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File(
				"data/twohanded.dat"));
		while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
			if (c == 0)
				itemTwoHanded[counter] = false;
			else
				itemTwoHanded[counter] = true;
			counter++;
		}
		dataIn.close();

//itemTwoHanded[counter] = true; twohanded cange to flase of untradeable
} catch (IOException e) {
System.out
.println(“Critical error while loading twohanded! Trace:”);
e.printStackTrace();
}

	counter = 0;
	try {
		FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File(
				"data/tradeable.dat"));
		while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
			if (c == 0)
				itemTradeable[counter] = false;
			else
				itemTradeable[counter] = true;
			counter++;
		}
		dataIn.close();
                  //itemTradeable[itemid] = false --non tradrable change to true for tradeab;e
	} catch (IOException e) {
		System.out
				.println("Critical error while loading tradeable! Trace:");
		e.printStackTrace();
	}

	counter = 0;
	try {
		FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File(
				"data/sellable.dat"));
		while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
			if (c == 0)
				itemSellable[counter] = true;
			else
				itemSellable[counter] = false;
			counter++;
		}
		dataIn.close();
		itemSellable[1543] = false;
		itemSellable[1544] = false;
                    //Anything here flase = non selable true = sellable
	} catch (IOException e) {
		System.out.println("Critical error while loading sellable! Trace:");
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}[/code]
